messages.title: My Priorities for Holborn & St Pancras
messages.content: Proper funding of all NHS services so that you and your family can get the care needed, when it is needed. I want all residents to get the physical and mental support they need delivered by our dedicated NHS staff, funded and managed correctly.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The NHS - I Was A Nurse
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Proper funding of all NHS services so that you and your family can get the care needed, when it is needed.
Having worked in A&E I have seen the devastating effects of knife crime and drugs. More Police on our streets will bring security to our residents.
I will cut toxic air pollutants by reducing traffic congestion and the idling of vehicles on roads to improve the air we all breathe.

issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school
issues.environment: The Air We Breathe - I will cut toxic air pollutants by reducing traffic congestion and the idling of vehicles on roads to improve the air we all breathe.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS, 40 new hospitals across the country
issues.lawCrime: 20,000 extra police for safer streets, More Police on our streets will bring security to our residents and freedom to be safely outdoors

community.content: £3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses, Gigabit broadband for the whole country

endorsements.endorsement: Let's get Brexit done. Let's get on with the country's priorities. LET'S UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL.
